text: Va Ust, ki pesopesi rahmati xud ʙodhoro ʙa ʙasorat mefiristad. Cun ʙodho aʙrhoi garonʙorro ʙardorand, Mo on aʙrro ʙa sarzaminhoi murda (az ʙeoʙi) ravon sozem va az on ʙoron mefiristem va ʙo ʙoron har guna mevahoero merujonem. Cunon ki zamini murdaro ʙo oʙi ʙoron zinda megardonem, murdagonro niz incunin zinda megardonem, sojad pand gired
